Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards. This product embodies excellence and is valued at $8000 by us due to its unique features and quality. Considering its exceptional value, we're extending this exclusive opportunity to you at an introductory price of $7500. Don't miss out on this chance to own a piece that promises to exceed your expectations. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $7,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $7,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $15,000
